summary: Navigation - Welcome to Pepe Osaka’s Fishtaco and Tequila Bar. We are celebrating our 10th year of serving the County. We thank you all for making this milestone happen. Come join us for the Best Margaritas and our hybrid Tacos that will blow your mind! We have the largest selection of Tequilas and Mezcales you could ever ask for. We are always evolving and bringing new flavors to the table. Ask your server for details on our latest creations. Check out our new favorites like the Spicy Steak Bowl and the Sushi Burrito.
